title: Pool Party Fiora and Yasuo Sound BUG

embed.description: This is just for jokes. The buffs were nice, pls don't remove Riot. Only Fiora mains know this problem. Fiora's Q has the same sound as Yasuo's Q whenever they are both in game, regardless of which team the Yasuo is on. The sound applies to everything and not just on Yasuo.

body: Whenever Pool Party Fiora and Yasuo are in the same game,Fiora's Q has the same sound as Yasuo Q. FIX THIS PLEASE.This bug hasn't been fixed for months.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! I'll take a look into this today! :)

Thank you!This bug exists for every fiora skin btw but it was very noticable on pool party skin because it felt weird that she uses a noodle but makes the sound of sword when using q. And the vitals on the pool party skin is very difficult to see.Can you make them a bit more distinguishable? In late game teamfights i can barely see the vitals.

Hey again! I took a lot at this in game yesterday, and the proper sounds are playing for me.

I loaded into the game as base Fiora and Pool Party Fiora and in both instances, against an enemy Yasuo, the proper sounds effects played.

I know we did some audio clean up for patch 7.1 - Jhin and Karma had a similar issue with audio being stolen from another champion, so that may have solved the issue. 

Feel free to lemme know if you're still hearing the incorrect sounds in the new patch, and I'd be happy to take another look. 

I know the pod who worked on Pool Party Fiora had sign off from gameplay that the vitals were okay, but I can sync up with them again and pass along your feedback.
Thanks ! Just played 2 games with Yasuo and didn't have the sound bug on the Q.Bought pool party skin 2 days ago and nice to see the bug fixed so quick.
Okay, sweet! Thanks for checking it out! <3

Can confirm what OP is saying - whenever I'm Fiora and there's a Yasuo on the enemy team my Q sound is replaced by his. I've noticed this bug with Yasuo's classic and Project skin. I've also noticed that this happens when I play Nightraven and Project Fiora.
Would you mind taking a look with the new patch? As I'd posted in the comment above, changes were made that should take effect in 7.1. :)
